name: Machine Learning Ethics References
description: Machine Learning and Data Science discrimination, bias and ethics.

name: WikiTruth |
description: A Wikipedia and Quora-like system with a vetting mechanism to verify facts from trash.

name: Programmer's Oath
description: An ethics oath for programmers, comparable to the Hippocratic Oath.

name: Ethical Design Manifesto
description: The Maslov Pyramid of Needs redrawn for sites and projects practicing ethical design.

name: Ethical OS Toolkit
description: A guide to anticipating the future impact of today's technology.

name: ACM Code of Ethics
description: The Association for Computing Machinery's code of ethics and professional conduct.

name: Privacy Badger |
description: Privacy Badger by Electronic Frontier Foundation blocks spying ads and invisible trackers.

name: Exodus Privacy |
description: Analyzes privacy concerns in Android applications.

name: Exodify |
description: Wondering if an app is tracking you? Now you can see it directly in the Play store.

name: Ungoogled Chromium
description: Chromium without Google integration, enhancing privacy, control, transparency

name: Signal |
description: Signal is a messaging app for simple private communication with friends.

name: uBlock Origin
description: An efficient wide-spectrum blocker for Chromium and Firefox. Fast and lean.

name: ConsentCookie |
description: Customizable script that allow users to opt-in for cookies on a case-by-case basis.

name: Mozilla Contain-Facebook
description: Firefox plugin to prevent tracking outside of the Facebook website via 3rd-party cookies.

name: Fair Analytics
description: A Google Analytics-alike server that doesn't undermine user's privacy.

name: Privacy Respecting
description: A curated list of privacy-respecting Services and Software.

name: Hosts
description: Consolidates several reputable hosts files, and merges them into a single unified one.

name: Blocklists
description: Shared lists of problem domains people may want to block with hosts files.

name: SilverDog |
description: An audio firewall to block ultrasound tracking applications.

name: Matomo |
description: The leading open alternative to Google Analytics that gives you full control over your data.

name: Referrer Spam Blacklist |
description: Community-contributed list of referrer spammers.

name: Tracking Token Stripper
description: Browser extension that strips Google Analytics (UTM) tokens from URL query strings.

name: Trackless
description: Add a GDPR-friendly Google Analytics opt-in/opt-out button to your site.

name: Fathom |
description: A simpler and more privacy-focused alternative to Google Analytics.

name: Local Sheriff
description: A browser extension that helps identify what sensitive information (PII) is shared / leaked to 3rd-parties.

name: Mastodon |
description: Your self-hosted, globally interconnected microblogging community.

name: Diaspora |
description: A privacy-aware, distributed, open source social network.

name: Humnub |
description: A feature rich and highly flexible open-source Social Network Kit written in PHP.

name: Patchwork |
description: A decentralized messaging and sharing app built on top of Secure Scuttlebutt (SSB).

name: Pump.io |
description: A stream server that does most of what people really want from a social network.

name: Voten |
description: An open-source, beautiful, highly customizable yet deadly simple, and warm community.

name: Socialhome |
description: A federated personal profile with social networking functionality.

name: Facebook Demetricator |
description: A web browser extension that removes all the metrics from the Facebook interface.

name: Twitter Demetricator |
description: A web browser extension that removes all the metrics on Twitter.

name: News Feed Eradicator
description: A browser extension that replaces your Facebook news feed with a nice quote.

name: Granary |
description: The social web translator that breaks silo's by converting data between social networks.

name: Neocities |
description: Social network that brings back the lost individual creativity of the web.

name: Alternative Internet |
description: A collection of interesting new networks and tech aiming at decentralisation (in some form).

name: GlobaLeaks |
description: Free and open source software intended to enable Secure and Anonymous Whistleblowing initiatives.

name: SecureDrop |
description: Whistleblower submission system to securily interact with anonymous sources.

name: Security Belt
description: A framework for improving the IT-Security of your teams through gamification.

name: Habitica |
description: Gamify your life. Motivate yourself to achieve your goals.

name: Stanford HabitLab |
description: Change your online habits, set goals, try interventions, view progress.

name: redshift |
description: Redshift adjusts the color temperature of your screen according to your surroundings.

name: Safe Eyes |
description: Safe Eyes is a tool for Linux users to reduce and prevent repetitive strain injury (RSI).

name: Prisma Care |
description: App that strengthens the relationship between people with memory loss and people close to them.

name: Loop Habit Tracker
description: An Android app for creating and maintaining good habits.

name: If me |
description: A community for mental health experiences encouraging people to share their stories with loved ones.

name: Mindfulness at the Computer |
description: Helps you stay mindful of your breathing while using your computer.

name: Breathe |

name: Chomper |

name: Happy DB |

description: Analyze the Facebook copy of your own data.
